result.markdown:
---
title: 'Emoji Annotations'
author: "Lucy D'Agostino McGowan"
date: '2020-05-18'
slug: graph-detective
categories: [rstats, emoji, ggplot, data visualizations]
tags: [rstats, emoji, ggplot, data visualizations]
draft: true
description: "A quick how-to on adding emojis to your ggplots"
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
remotes::install_github("wilkelab/ggtext")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggtext)
library(emo)
library(tidyverse)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_richtext(label = emo::ji("scream"), aes(x = 1250, y = 200))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Removed 28 rows containing missing values
(`geom_point()`).
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in do_once((if (is_R_CMD_check()) stop else
warning)("The function xfun::isFALSE() will be deprecated
in the future. Please ", : The function xfun::isFALSE()
will be deprecated in the future. Please consider using
base::isFALSE(x) or identical(x, FALSE) instead.
```
